issue.title: [CF 1104] arithmetic on a counter?
issue.body:
I'm wanting to do a modulo on a counter in my Power Strikes icon, is that possible? My knowledge is pretty basic and I didn't have any luck trying to google "counter" upon the api pages.

Was looking to do modulo 15 in notification #5, here is the icon:

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^STALENTLEARNED ^SName^S19992 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SName^S129914 ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SAnimations ^SAnimation^SICONCLEAR ^SEvent^SOnHide ^t^N2^T ^SType^SCounter ^SCounter^Spowerstrikes ^SCounterOperation^S= ^SEvent^SOnHide ^SCounterAmt^N-1 ^t^N3^T ^SType^SAnimations ^SDuration^N4 ^SAnimation^SACTVTNGLOW ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^N4^T ^SType^SCounter ^SOnlyShown^B ^SEvent^SWCSP ^SCounter^Spowerstrikes ^t^N5^T ^SType^SAnimations ^SAnimation^SICONSHAKE ^SEvent^SOnCondition ^SOnConditionConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SLUA ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^t^N6^T ^SType^SCounter ^SCounterAmt^N0 ^SCounterOperation^S= ^SEvent^SOnCondition ^SCounter^Spowerstrikes ^SOnConditionConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOUNTER ^SOperator^S>= ^SLevel^N60 ^SName^Spowerstrikes ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^t^Sn^N6 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon2 ^STexts^T ^N1^S[Counter("powerstrikes"):Hide(0,~`1,~`2,~`3,~`4,~`5,~`6,~`7)] ^t^t^t^SGUID^STMW:icon:1L3I5EgCD8j2 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N72603^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

comments.body:
Add this as a Lua notification handler:

``` -- <Untitled Lua Code> local icon = ... --Your code goes here: local name = "powerstrikes" TMW.COUNTERS[name] = TMW.COUNTERS[name] % 15 TMW:Fire("TMW_COUNTER_MODIFIED", name) ```

(The info on how to do this is in the tooltip on the Counter Name editbox).

Edited Mar 24, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Ah sorry, I missed that apparently x). Thanks for the help.
